name: Penguin's Color
description:
/ ! \ SOUND ON / ! \ (better for experiencing ;))

Try yourself and play Penguin's Color !

You have to help Pingu, a little penguin, to climb up the stairs ! Click on the appropriate buttons, or use D,F,G,H to climb !

Try to be fast, as steps are disappearing behind you...and don't miss the colors !

Have fun !
